title: Flutter Projects
desc: This repository contains the demo application of the package edualgo in Flutter and Dart.

title: Insta Clone
desc: The app contains a basic structure of Instagram. Instagram is a free photo and video sharing app available on iPhone and Android. People can upload photos or videos to our service and share them with their followers or with a selected group of friends.

title: Wordle App
desc: The app contains wordle clone. Wordle is a daily word game created by Josh Wardle, a Brooklyn-based software engineer who has developed something of a reputation as a crafter of interesting social experiments.

title: Digital ID
desc: The app contains a basic structure of Digital ID. Digital ID is a free photo and video sharing app available on iPhone and Android. People can upload photos or videos to our service and share them with their followers or with a selected group of friends.
